title: Pizza for grown-ups
ingredients: ['500g strong white flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '7g dried active yeast', '250ml water', 'For the topping', '2 large red onions, sliced', 'olive oil', '1 pinch soft brown sugar', '1 (250g) ball mozzarella cheese, sliced', '1 handful grated Cheddar or another strong cheese', '3 to 6 slices Serrano ham', 'balsamic vinegar']
